meanings.definition: A statement of money owed for goods or services provided.
meanings.sent1: I have many bills to pay for the things I bought.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant gave me the bill after I finished my meal.
meanings.sent3: My cat likes to play with crumpled bills, thinking they are toys.
meanings.sent4: The stack of bills on the table seemed to grow taller each day.
meanings.sent5: The overdue bills loomed over me like dark clouds on a stormy day.

meanings.definition: A proposed law presented to a legislative body for consideration.
meanings.sent1: The senator introduced a new bill to improve healthcare.
meanings.sent2: The bill was discussed and debated by the members of parliament.
meanings.sent3: The bill to make ice cream mandatory on Fridays was met with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The bill to protect endangered species was a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The bill to reduce pollution was a step towards a cleaner environment.

meanings.sent1: The billboard displayed a colorful bill for the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent2: I saw a bill in the newspaper for a sale at the local store.
meanings.sent3: The bill for the new movie was so enticing, I had to see it.
meanings.sent4: The bill for the fashion show caught the attention of many.
meanings.sent5: The bill for the charity event was beautifully designed to attract donors.
